title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.3 - Vehicles required to keep right
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.3 - Vehicles required to keep right

State Regulations

Vehicles shall at all times keep to the right of the roadway, except as otherwise directed by either traffic signs or an employee of the
bridge. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
654.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
